Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
1. Timely - I can get feedback before I do another assessment (sometimes feedback takes a long time to get)
2. More specific/more indepth - Teachers mark a lot of assessments so they can't talk about every little thing.
3. More conversational - I can talk to it about different things I did, different approaches I could do next time and overall just get more like you would if you had a conversation with ur teacher.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: No, maybe more satisfied since its more indepth.
